item.description: This is soon, but I want to get in a good trivia match before Christmas. I just realized that with my current schedule, this Tuesday would be the one good option. Come join me in a cozy bar in Hyde Square, in the heart of funky Jamaica Plain, to say goodbye to a crazy year. Brendan Behan is about a 10-minute walk from the Jackson Square T station. You can usually find some street parking on Centre. I'll be there around 7:15; match starts at 8:00. Will post the colors I'm wearing on game day so you can find me.
item.name: Go to Behan's in JP
